name: Registrar
description:
For more than 15 years, IPONWEB has been creating innovative projects that allow expanding opportunities in the field of media trading. We are world leaders among companies that create AdTech technologies and infrastructure.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Manage Labor Safety Project and Labor Protection Project to comply with statutory reporting:

    • keep signature registrar journal;

    • updating addendums for passing education of labor Safety;

    • maintaining signed addendums in designated folders;

  • Support IOW employees with statutory / legal paperwork under HR Admin supervision:

    • signing employment agreements, addendums related to personal data, filling labor contracts in Employment Journal;

    • scanning labor contracts for purpose of updating Iron Folder;

    • providing employment verification, credit checks support: issuing docs;

    • NDFL2, employment letters confirmation, providing official copies of Labor Books;

    • managing paperwork with respect to vacation (creating Director’s orders, obtaining signatures);

    • documenting Sick-leave days, signing Sick-leave lists;

    • visiting Pension Funds in-person, documents confirmation / verification;

  • Statutory Reporting to controlling bodies:

    • work experience of employees filing papers;

    • forms СЗВ-М and СЗВ-СТАЖ to Pension Fund monthly;

  • Serve as a back-up for HR admin, support day-to-day documents signing, update employment agreements where necessary.

Role Requirements:

  • Knowledge of Labor Code, Civil Code, Moscow City Mayor Order and updates;

  • BS degree;

  • Good English reading and writing skills;

  • Knowledge of the competence matrix.

We offer you:

  • Career opportunity within High Tech international company - one of the leaders in the Programmatic Marketing industry;

  • Open and approachable management team with strong engineering DNA (80% of Moscow office - engineers, managers and executives with technical background);

  • Internal pathways for career development and professional growth, supported by Performance Management System;

  • Competitive compensation package;

  • Corporate Health Insurance Program or Voluntary Insurance Program (VMI);

  • Internal and external learning courses both for professional and soft skills development;

  • English Corporate Programs;

  • Relocation Program for you and your family from any region of Russia to Moscow office;

  • Full flexibility outside our core working hours 12:00-18:00;

  • Referral Bonus Program;

  • Recognition of employee milestones.

IPONWEB provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to sex, race, religion, national origin, age, sexual orientation, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, IPONWEB complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities.
